entries.category: The Clone Relics, A fallen hero
entries.journal_entry_description: One of the troopers of the Clone Wars wants revenge for being left to die by his old commander, now a corrupt armsdealer selling imperial military material.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find Jabba's palace on Tatooine and get a hold of some one in his organization whom the information you have is relevant to.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Jabba's employee believe Jabba wants to hear about this personally but privately. You need to find a way to learn Huttese and apparently there's a woman in the city of Wayfar named Walda, that may be able to teach it to you.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you've learned some basic Huttese, return to Jawl in the palace and see if he can set up a meeting with Jabba for you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Jawl has set up an appointment for you to speak to Jabba. Hopefully your Huttese is up to date, or Jabba might get offended.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Jabba is not happy and a angry Jabba isn't good for anyone. He wants Morkov dead and any logs of his 'business' that you can find. You can only guess what Jabba is planning to do with the people named in those logs.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You have Morkov's datapad, return it to Jabba before he grows impatient.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Mort in the Dearic cantina on Talus and tell him what happened.
